SearchEquipmentEioHistory.MainSQL: SELECT EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_STATE_CODE AS EIO, OLD_EQUIPMENT_STATE_CODE AS EIO_PV, EIOIFMODE AS IF, EIOIFMODE_PV AS IF_PV, TRANSACTION_DATE, TRANSACTION_CODE AS DESC_, TRANSACTION_USER_ID AS USER_ FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_HIST WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = @EQUIPMENT_ID +Option1 ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DATE DESC
